Body: I recently got my first Android Device, it's from a company called Verykool, it's a Spark II. And along with the phone, came apps I don't want, and bloatware. However, I did manage to gain root access. I can't seem to find a ROM compatible with the phone. Is there anywhere specific I could find one? Or am I just missing it? One of the apps I want to remove is required since I can't update my device otherwise, and I really want to remove all this. Any help would be appreciated. I'm currently running Android KitKat.
Title: Question about ROM's for my Specific Device

history.Text: I recently got my first Android Device, it's from a company called Verykool, it's a Spark II. And along with the phone, came apps I don't want, and bloatware. However, I did manage to gain root access. I can't seem to find a ROM compatible with the phone. Is there anywhere specific I could find one? Or am I just missing it? One of the apps I want to remove is required since I can't update my device otherwise, and I really want to remove all this. Any help would be appreciated. I'm currently running Android KitKat.
